import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import TablaInformes from "./TablaInformes"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; export default function Opciones({ indicador }) { const year = new Date().getFullYear(); let month = new Date().getMonth(); let day = new Date().getDate(); day = day < 10 ? `0${day}` : day; month = month + 1 < 10 ? `0${month + 1}` : month + 1; const today = `${year}-${month}-${day}`; const cicloNivel = ["2", "13"]; const calendario = ["1", "4", "8", "14"]; const calendarioYFormaDePago = ["5", "6"]; const [concepto, setConcepto] = useState([]); const [tabla, setTabla] = useState([]); const [ciclo, setCiclo] = useState(year); const [nivel, setNivel] = useState("0"); const [fechaDesde, setFechaDesde] = useState(`${year}-01-01`); const [fechaHasta, setFechaHasta] = useState(`${year}-12-31`); const [formaDePago, setFormaDePago] = useState(0); const [deuda, setDeuda] = useState(1000); const [fechaPresentacion, setFechaPresentacion] = useState(""); const [tipoArancel, setTipoArancel] = useState(0); const [opcion, setOpcion] = useState(0); const [tipoCaja, setTipoCaja] = useState(0); const [tipoMovimiento, setTipoMovimiento] = useState(-1); const [conceptoValor, setConceptoValor] = useState(0); function traerComboConceptos(e) { e.preventDefault(); axios .get( `https://www.califcolegios.wnpower.host/donboscocastelarweb/app/informes/comboconceptoscaja.php?idconcepto=${e.target.value}` ) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); setConcepto(response.data); }); } document .getElementById("searchButton") .addEventListener("click", function (e) { traerInformeAlumnos(e); }); function traerInformeAlumnos(e) { e.preventDefault(); if (cicloNivel.includes(indicador)) { if (indicador === "2" && nivel === "0") { Swal.fire({ title: `Se debe ingresar un Nivel`, icon: "warning", showCloseButton: true, }).then((result) => { return; }); } axios .get( `https://www.califcolegios.wnpower.host/donboscocastelarweb/app/informes/salida_reporte${indicador}.php?idusuario=83&ciclo=${ciclo}&idnivel=${nivel}` ) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); setTabla(response.data); }); } } useEffect(() => { setConcepto([]); setCiclo(year); setNivel(""); setFechaDesde(`${year}-01-01`); setFechaHasta(`${year}-12-31`); setFormaDePago(0); setDeuda(1000); setFechaPresentacion(""); setTipoArancel(0); setOpcion(0); setTipoCaja(0); setTipoMovimiento(-1); setConceptoValor(0); }, [indicador]); return ( <>
{cicloNivel.includes(indicador) ? (
) : ( "" )}
{calendario.includes(indicador) ? (
setFechaDesde(e.target.value)} Value={`${year}-01-01`} >
setFechaHasta(e.target.value)} Value={`${year}-12-31`} >
) : ( "" )}
{calendarioYFormaDePago.includes(indicador) ? (
setFechaDesde(e.target.value)} Value={today} >
setFechaHasta(e.target.value)} Value={today} >
) : ( "" )}
{indicador === "9" ? (
setDeuda(e.target.value)} Value="1000" >
setFechaPresentacion(e.target.value)} >
) : ( "" )}
{indicador === "10" ? (
setDeuda(e.target.value)} Value="1000" >
) : ( "" )}
{indicador === "7" ? (
) : ( "" )}
{indicador === "11" ? (
) : ( "" )}
); }
